net.dongliu.requests

类 RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dongliu.requests.BaseRequestBuilder<RequestBuilder>
      • net.dongliu.requests.RequestBuilder

  • public final class RequestBuilder
extends BaseRequestBuilder<RequestBuilder>
    The Mixin Http Request builder, bind ability of BaseRequestBuilder and ClientBuilder, using for Requests util methods. This class use the name for compatible reason.
